android.car.app

接口 ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewCallback


  • public interface ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewCallback
    A callback interface for ControlledRemoteCarTaskView.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void onTaskAppeared(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo)
      Called when the task has appeared in the taskview.
      default void onTaskInfoChanged(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo)
      Called when the task's info has changed.
      default void onTaskVanished(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo)
      Called when the task has vanished.
      default void onTaskViewCreated(ControlledRemoteCarTaskView taskView)
      Called when the underlying RemoteCarTaskView instance is created.
      default void onTaskViewInitialized()
      Called when the underlying RemoteCarTaskView is ready.
      default void onTaskViewReleased()
      Called when the underlying RemoteCarTaskView is released.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onTaskViewCreated

        default void onTaskViewCreated(ControlledRemoteCarTaskView taskView)
        Called when the underlying RemoteCarTaskView instance is created.
        参数:
        taskView - the new newly created RemoteCarTaskView instance.

      • onTaskViewInitialized

        default void onTaskViewInitialized()
        Called when the underlying RemoteCarTaskView is ready. A RemoteCarTaskView can be considered ready when it has completed all the set up that is required. This callback is only triggered once.

      • onTaskViewReleased

        default void onTaskViewReleased()
        Called when the underlying RemoteCarTaskView is released. This callback is only triggered once.

      • onTaskAppeared

        default void onTaskAppeared(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo)
        Called when the task has appeared in the taskview.
        参数:
        taskInfo - the taskInfo of the task that has appeared.

      • onTaskInfoChanged

        default void onTaskInfoChanged(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo)
        Called when the task's info has changed.
        参数:
        taskInfo - the taskInfo of the task that has a change in info.

      • onTaskVanished

        default void onTaskVanished(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo)
        Called when the task has vanished.
        参数:
        taskInfo - the taskInfo of the task that has vanished.
